packages.description: An array with all packages to be displayed on DX Launcher.

name.description: The name of the song package.

version.description: The version of the song package.

fileSize.description: The file size of the song package. Must always be the file size of the Xbox 360 CON file format.

songsCount.description: The number of the songs inside the song package.

dta.description: The URL of the songs.dta file inside the song package.

thumbnail.description:
The URL of the song package artwork.
Preffered format and size: WEBP format, 256x256 pixels.

markdown.description: A description file in Markdown file format.

downloadXbox.description: The Download URL of your song package in Xbox 360 CON Format.

downloadPS3.description: The Download URL of your song package in PS3 PKG Format.

downloadWii.description: The Download URL of your song package in Wii Format (Meta and Song folders), compressed in ZIP or 7ZIP format.
